Frank,
  When native americans come across, or when people of other ethnic regions come across, do they speak in their native tongue?

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          This is from 24, but I used a different deck that resulted in weak, and noisy recoridng. That's the first time for this "Blackfoot". I think they are talking about Whitley Strieber. I'd send it to him, but there's about zero chance of it being recieved, or listend to, as most of these people tend "know better". 
 
 Frank-S
